sentences.sContent: People often derogate others in social comparison and the past selves in temporal comparison so that they can achieve self-enhancement and ultimately get good self-feelings.
sentences.sContent_eng: People often derogate others in social comparison and the past selves in temporal comparison so that they can achieve self-enhancement and ultimately get good self-feelings.
sentences.sCn: 在社会比较中人们会贬低他人，在时间比较中人们会贬低过去的自我，从而来达到提高自我，最终使现在的自我感觉良好。

remMethod.val: de(坏) + rog(问， 说) + ate → 说坏话 → 贬低

trans.tranOther: to cause to seem inferior or be in disrepute; detract
